alert.note: Alert for Baker; Colquitt; Mitchell; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:56AM EDT until June 12 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 745 AM EDT. * At 656 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Camilla, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Moultrie, Pelham, Camilla, Norman Park, Baconton, Doerun, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Schley, Berlin, Funston, Sale City, Ellenton, Flint, Enon, Cotton, South Moultrie and Chastain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
